author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Adlib exhibiting at Venue Expo
text:
Adlib exhibiting at Venue Expo Adlib exhibiting at Venue Expo Details Category: Show   16:15 Speke-based Adlib, the sound, lighting and audio-visual specialists, will be exhibiting at Venue Expo 2015, the first major show following the opening of the new Exhibition Centre in Liverpool. Venue Expo takes place from 8th and 9th September and will see Adlib showcasing their new Absen A3 Pro LED Screen, which will be prominently placed in the foyer, showing still images, videos and presentations from sponsors and exhibitors. 
Suzanne Adams, Adlib’s corporate development manager, said: “Adlib is proud to be part of this exciting and innovative inaugural show at the Exhibition Centre. It will be great to meet more venues and prospective clients visiting our home town. “Adlib will be showcasing our latest technical solutions to the market and also our creative and technical team will be on hand to discuss directly any requirements the attendees may have.” The Venue Expo 2015, now in its second year, will once again be attracting MICE (Meetings, Incentives, Conferences and Exhibitions) industry professionals, venues, top suppliers and events support services from all corners of the UK. Adlib provides audio, lighting and video for both rental and installation and understands that event organisers are now seeking the very latest event technology to stay ahead of their competitors due to increasing demand and new developments within the industry. In response to this demand, Adlib will be presenting its new Absen A3 Pro LED Screen and it is a great opportunity to find out more about the other services that the company can provide. The screen is made of industry-leading Absen A3 Pro video panels with highly accurate colour consistency and brightness uniformity across the entire display and capable of resolutions far in excess of ‘Full HD’. Adlib has also designed a bespoke exhibition stand to showcase all the services of the company including specialist event sound, lighting and video products. Adlib specialist staff will be on hand to answer all technical event production questions and enquiries. Related articles
